segments.text: Ugh, that sink is a mess—water pouring out like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is gross; it's everywhere now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, and her apron's probably getting soaked too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why hasn't she noticed? It's disgusting how unaware she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids climbing for cookies—filthy hands in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting, and crumbs might fall into that wet spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up; she'll probably drop one on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets are dripping with water— what a slimy sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside looks clean, but in here it's just nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't want to clean up that soggy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel she's using might get drenched next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen needs a good scrub.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies in this mess? Yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR
